thread.title: Which flavor won the Lay's 'Do Us a Flavor' contest? | www.palmbeachpost.com
thread.title_full: Which flavor won the Lay's 'Do Us a Flavor' contest? | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Samantha Jordan
title: Which flavor won the Lay's 'Do Us a Flavor' contest? | www.palmbeachpost.com
text:
It's official: Southern Biscuits and Gravy is the hands down winner of Lay's annual 'Do Us a Flavor' contest.
The savory creation was voted the top flavor by millions of consumers, beating out competitors Kettle Cooked Greektown Gyro, New York Reuben, and Wavy West Coast Truffle Fries to take home the title.
>> Read more trending stories
Top chip creator, Hailey Green of Noblesville, Indiana, will take home $1 million or one percent of her flavorâ€™s net sales through July 15, 2016, depending which is higher reports Yahoo! Food .
Green says her grandmother's biscuits and gravy inspired her contest entry.
Guys we did it. Southern Biscuits and Gravy (Hailey) won the @Lays #DoUsAFlavor contest!! Thank you ALL for voting! ðŸ˜€

( tweet )
Hats off to our yummy Do Us A Flavor finalists! Try all 4 and vote to save your fave.
Posted by Lay's on Monday, September 21, 2015
